ygData.subject: RE: Magical Gloves?
ygData.msgSnippet: The other day someone offered me Black iron gloves.  He claimed that they gave you the ability to punch magical only creatures.  Low AC, no stat adjustment,
ygData.messageBody:
The other day someone offered me Black iron gloves. He claimed that
they gave you the ability to punch magical only creatures. Low AC, no
stat adjustment, 5lb weight and high price dissuaded me from buying
them. I've been thinking (ouch) though, maybe they would be handy
for those times that you play support bard and contribute some kung fu
to the fight. What do you all think?

Bujold
18th Xegony


______________________________ Reply Separator _________________________________
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Magical Gloves?
Author: Non-HP-kblair (kblair@...) at HP-ColSprings,mimegw5
Date: 7/26/99 11:06 AM


From: "Blair, Keith (Keith Blair)" <kblair@...>

> Dragoon Dirk - get one a.s.a.p. 20pp or so in or near Crushbone.

I've been searching (on Veeshan) for one of these for 3 weeks now in various
zones and continents. The *only* time someone was selling one and replied to
me was for 75pp. I'm sorry, but magical or not - I'm not paying 75pp for a
friggin' dagger - at least not that particular dagger.
